home.title: Nelson Adarmes
home.subtitle: FrontEnd Web Developer
home.text: I am a student in the Programming Technician program at the National Technological University (UTN). My portfolio consists of projects where I have sought to tackle real-world problems, aiming to gain experience and knowledge. I invite you to check them out!

about.title: About Me

education.subtitle: Education:
education.text: Technician in Programming - National Technological University [UTN] (In Progress)

about.text: In addition to my university studies, I have been studying programming on my own for almost 3 years. My current stack positions me as a Front-End developer, but I am interested in becoming FullStack, so I am learning SQL and Node.js. I also know the basics of Python. I am a very creative and resourceful person, with over 4 years of experience in customer service and 3 years as a logistics coordinator for a technical team. This has allowed me to develop strong soft skills, enabling me to communicate effectively through any medium and collaborate efficiently.

trackingTool.subtitle: Tracking Tool
trackingTool.text: A tool for my current job that receives two Excel sheets and displays information on the screen in a specific order.

chromeExtension.subtitle: Google Chrome Extension
chromeExtension.text: A tool for my current job that retrieves information when certain elements are on the page and displays it within the same page.

metronome.subtitle: Metronome
metronome.text: An application that includes a metronome and a random number generator for practical, musical purposes.
